# pyspark_dubber.sql.functions.from_json

```python
pyspark_dubber.sql.functions.from_json(
	col: pyspark_dubber.sql.expr.Expr | str,
	schema: pyspark_dubber.sql.types.DataType | str,
	options=None,
)
```

[PySpark API Reference](https://spark.apache.org/docs/latest/api/python/reference/pyspark.sql/api/pyspark.sql.functions.from_json.html)

!!! warning "Incompatibility Note"

    options are completely ignored
